channel.title: How do we change item stats and exp given from dummys and stuff?
channel.description: Title says it how do we change item stats like to where it adds 300 str or so and how do we change the ammount of xp the dummys and all the leveling things give?

@Slappa4 wrote:

Thanks, mate. If we were wanting to change all the other exp giving things what case would we search for?

item.source: How do we change item stats and exp given from dummys and stuff?

item.title: How do we change item stats and exp given from dummys and stuff?
item.dc:creator: @smartdude6 smartdude6
item.description:
@smartdude6 wrote:

Go into your client.java and search for

case 823:

Well this is how mine looks

case 823: if (playerLevel[2] > 70) { sendMessage("You learned inof of the dummys"); } else { if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("Crush that dummy"); setAnimation(1110); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((250*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 12; } } break;

And change the bold number to the desire exp you want the players to get when they train on the dummys

addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[2]), 2);
addSkillXP((250*playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[18]), 18);

Read full topic
